# trackingMode

**Instance Property**

The tracking mode used for the segments of the control.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var trackingMode: NSSegmentedControl.SwitchTracking { get set }
```

## Discussion

Possible values for `trackingMode` are described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSegmentedControl/SwitchTracking]. The default value is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSegmentedControl/SwitchTracking/selectOne].
